data.text: Takaw yad apin ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Bɨ tap kuŋay mɨdeb ak, tap ne okok mɨdupsek ñapay ne ak nop ñɨnɨg aglup. Ñapay anɨb ak tap mɨdupsek mɨdeb ak pen, ne sɨkol mɨdek, tap ne ma mɨdeb tek lup.
Pen bɨ kɨli ñapay anɨb ak nop kod mɨdebal okok, anɨb gɨnɨmɨn agɨl ag dad amɨl, nap aglak ñɨn ak apek nep, tap ne anɨb okok dup.
4.3 Gal 2.4, 3.23, Kol 2.20 Chɨn abe ñɨsɨkol tek yolɨgɨpun ñɨn ak, chɨp day, kɨcheki, tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek takaw agɨlak ak nɨŋɨd, binɨb wog gɨñeb kɨli tek yolɨgɨpun.

4.4 Stt 3.15, Mat 5.17, Luk 1.31, Jon 1.14, Lom 1.3, Epe 1.10, Hib 2.14 Pen God ne ke aglak ñɨn ak apek, Ñɨne nop agek, apɨl bin olap nop nab ayaŋ amek, nop tɨkak. Tɨkek, ne Mosis takaw adek ak nɨg mɨdɨl, mɨd dad amek,
4.5 Mat 20.28, Jon 1.12, Gal 3.13, Epe 1.5-7, 1 Pi 1.18-19 binɨb takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨg mɨdɨl, mɨd dad abal okok, kɨlop adɨkɨl dup.4.5-7 Lom 8.15-17 Gek, chɨn God ñapay ne ak mɨdobun.
Nɨbi ñapay ne yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm tek, ne Kawnan ne ak yokek apɨl, chɨnop bak lup. Bak lup ak nɨm chɨn apun, Apa, Bapi apun.
4.7 Gal 3.29 Anɨb ak nɨbi binɨb kɨcheki wog gɨñeb yokɨp tek gelɨgɨpɨm okok, mɨñɨl God ñapay ne mɨdebɨm. God ñapay ne mɨdɨl, tap teplep ne dɨnɨgabɨm.
Bɨlel nɨbi God nop gos ma nepek ñɨn ak, binɨb kɨcheki wog gɨñeb kɨli tek gelɨgɨpɨm. Tap anɨb okok God nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mel.

4.9 Lom 8.3, 1 Ko 8.3, Kol 2.20, Hib 7.18 Pen mɨñɨl God nop gos nɨgtep gɨpɨm. Nɨbi pen nop nɨŋɨd ma dɨpek, ne ke nɨbop nɨŋɨd dak. Anɨb ak tek, taynen nɨbi takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨŋɨd, wog gɨñeb ne okok tek mɨdebɨm? Bɨlel chɨp day, kɨcheki, tap anɨb okok kɨdek gelɨgɨpɨm tek, mɨñɨl adɨkɨd apɨl kɨdek gebɨm. Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak ayɨp chɨp kɨcheki walɨjpal anɨb okok ayɨp, kɨli kɨles ma mɨdebal.

4.10 Lom 14.5, Kol 2.16 Pel ñɨn awl apal ak nep nɨŋɨd, takan awl apal ak nep nɨŋɨd, sɨme awl gep apal ak nep nɨŋɨd, sub awl apal ak nep nɨŋɨd gɨpɨm. Nɨbi takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gɨpɨm ak nɨm, ñɨn awl anɨb ak nɨŋɨd anɨb apɨm, Kɨdek chɨn mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun apɨm.
Nɨbop takaw tep agñen nepek ak pen, mɨñɨl kelɨgɨpɨm tek lek, nɨbop gos kuŋay nɨgebin.

Mam ay sɨkop. Yad nɨbop chɨb nɨŋɨd takaw kɨles tɨmel agebin, Yad mɨdebin tek mɨdem agebin. Ned takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgelɨgɨpin ak kelɨgɨl, nɨbi yokɨp yelɨgɨpɨm tek yenek. Yad nɨb ayɨp yenek ñɨn ak, yɨp dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨpek, tap olap yɨp ma gɨpek.
4.13 1 Ko 2.3, 2 Ko 11.30, 12.7-9 Nɨb nepɨm, yɨp mɨñak gak ak nɨm, man nɨbi ak mɨdɨl, nɨbop takaw teplep ak ned agñɨnek.
Mɨdtep ma gɨnek anɨb ak, yɨp yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd kud ma ñɨbek. God ensel olap akaŋ, Klays Jisas nep agɨl dɨpal tek yɨp dɨpek.

Yɨp dɨpek mɨñmɨñ adek anɨb ak, mɨñɨl dam yokɨpɨm akal? Am nɨb ayɨp yenek ñɨn ak, gos mɨñmɨñ nɨbi adek ak yad yɨl yek. Yɨp gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨl, wɨdɨn mɨdup nɨbi okok tɨg ju yɨp ñeb tek lek, monmon tɨg ju ñɨnɨmɨb tek ak mɨdebek.
4.16 Amo 5.10, Gal 2.5, 2.14 Pen mɨñɨl yɨp taynen kelɨgɨpɨm? Takaw nɨŋɨd agɨnek adek ak nɨŋɨd, mɨlɨk nepɨm akaŋ?
Bɨ anɨb okok nɨbop takaw ñɨg lɨl, gos teplep nɨbop gɨñun agɨl gos ma nepal. Mel. Anɨgɨl tɨg asɨk yɨp ke lɨl nɨbop ke lɨl lun agɨl anɨgɨpal ak, gos chɨnop nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl anɨgɨpal.
Yad nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl akaŋ, pal okok mɨden, bɨ ogɨnap nɨbop gos ñenɨgabal, tep gɨnɨgabal. Ak pen chɨnop kɨdek gɨlaŋ agɨl anɨgɨpal ak, tep ma gup.
Pen ñapay yad okok. Klays nop chɨgɨl, ne mɨdeb tek yenɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin. Anɨb ak tek, bin okok ñapay tɨkɨnɨg gel mɨŋel yɨbɨl gup tek gak ak, mɨñɨl yɨp tepayaŋ anɨgɨl geb.
Nɨb ayɨp mɨdebɨnep ak, takaw akal dɨl agɨnɨm agɨl nepɨnep ak pen, pal okok mɨdebin tek, gos nɨgen tekɨd dɨ yowup.
Pen nɨbi takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nep nɨgobun apɨm okok, Mosis takaw ak tɨkɨlɨg agɨlak takaw ak ma nepɨm tek lup.
4.22 Stt 16.15, 21.2 Takaw anɨb ak tɨkɨl agɨlak ak, Eblaham ñɨ omɨŋal tɨkak. Ñɨne olap, bin olap apɨl bin ne nop wog gɨñolɨgup ak nop dɨl tɨkak. Ñɨne olap, bin ne ke yɨbɨl ak ayɨp tɨkak.

4.23 Stt 18.10-14, Lom 9.7-9, Hib 11.11 Bin wog gɨñolɨgup ñɨ tɨkak ak, ñapay tɨkɨpal tek tɨkak. Pen bin ne ned ak ñapay wom mɨdɨl, God Eblaham nop ñɨ olap tɨkɨnɨgaban agɨl takaw aglak tek, ñɨ ak tɨkak.

4.24 Lom 8.15, Gal 5.1 Pen kesɨm jɨj anɨb ak, takaw yɨpɨl won ogɨnap sek mɨdeb. Bin wog gɨñeb Haga nɨm, Mosis takaw tek ak. Ned God takaw agak ak, Mosis nop ñak dum Saynay. Dum anɨb ak, man Alebiya mɨdeb. Jelusalem abe mɨñɨl mɨdeb ak, dum Saynay tek lup. Bin anɨb ak, ne tap anɨb okok gup tek ak mɨdeb. Anɨb ak, Juda kɨli pelnep Mosis takaw apal ak nɨm, Haga ñapay ne okok bɨ wog gɨñeb yokɨp okok tek mɨdebal.
4.26 Hib 12.22, Lep 3.12, 21.2, 21.10 Pen chɨn bin Haga kɨd ak nɨb ma mɨdobun. Ami chɨn nɨm, Jelusalem anɨb ak ke God man ne alaŋ nɨb ak. Ñapay ne okok bɨ wog gɨñeb yokɨp okok tek mel.
4.27 Ais 54.1 Anɨb ak tek, buk Baybol tɨkɨl agɨlak,

Mam ay sɨkop. God Eblaham nop, bin nad ke yɨbɨl ak ñapay olap tɨkɨnɨgab aglak. Aglek, gos anɨb ak nɨg mɨdel, ñɨne Aysak nop tɨkak. Anɨb ak tek, God chɨnop dɨnɨgayn aglek, gos anɨb ak nep nɨg mɨdon, chɨnop dek God ñapay ne mɨdobun.

4.29 Stt 21.9, Gal 5.11, 6.12 Ned ñɨn anɨb ak, Eblaham ñɨne binɨb ñapay tɨkɨpal tek bin wog gɨñeb ak tɨkak. Ñɨ anɨb ak tɨkjakɨl, nɨmam adɨk nop gɨ tɨmel gak. Nɨmam adɨk anɨb ak, God Kawnan kɨles ne ak Eblaham ñek tɨkak ak. Anɨb ak tek, mɨñɨl abe tap tɨmel gɨpal anɨb ak anɨgɨl nep mɨdeb.

4.30 Stt 21.10, Jon 8.35 Pen buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, Bin wog gɨñeb amɨlmɨŋal ak kɨlop agyokɨnɨmɨn agɨl tɨkɨlak. Bin nak ke yɨbɨl dɨl ñɨ tɨkɨnak ak, tap ne okok, ñɨ nak olap tap anɨb okok ma dɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak.
4.31 Jon 8.36, Gal 3.29, 5.1, 5.13 Anɨb ak mam sɨkop nɨgɨm. Chɨn bin yokɨp apɨl wog gɨñeb yek ak ñapay ne tek ma mɨdobun. Eblaham bin ne ke yɨbɨl dɨl ñapay tɨkak tek ak mɨdobun.
